column1: '''CDC Games''' (Chinese: 中华网游戏集团) is a Chinese company, specialized in developing and publishing video games. In 2006 CDC Games made an agreement with [[Turbine]], to published [[The Lord of the Rings Online]] in China. They released a beta, for which you had to pay to get access. Though spending $10.000.000 on the game, they still hadn't published anything in [[2011]]. Turbine saw this as a contract breach and terminated the agreement.<ref>{{webcite
column4: articlename=Lord of the Rings Online still not availble in China
